scripts.docker_rebuild: docker compose build && docker compose rm -s -v -f && docker compose up -d && docker compose logs -f
scripts.gitUpdate: git add . && git commit -m"update docker-changedetection-tryout," && git pull && git push
scripts.apply_carousell: npm run docker_stop_carousell_change && node ./utils/carousell_update_script.js && npm run docker_start_carousell_change
